title: Cannot submit app to the store using cppwinrt and XAML.
body:
I am using cppwinrt to build an app for the store, but the XAML IDL generation seems to be generating invalid metadata.
--------------

comments.body: Sorry for the delay. This mildrt bug has been fixed as of build 18310 of the Windows SDK.
This was a bug in the SDK midlrt.exe tool, fixed as of release 18310.

I'm running VS 16.1.3 with cppwinrt 2.0.190605.7 and I have the same problem when trying to create a package for Store certification. The problem report above is from Nov. 27, 2018 and today is June 13, 2019 - did the VSIX revert somehow and undo the bug fix described by Brian Rector below?
